ow.routing.impl
クラス RoutingDriverMessageFactory

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.impl.RoutingDriverMessageFactory
直系の既知のサブクラス:
McastMessageFactory
public class RoutingDriverMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object

An utility class to create a message for routing drivers.

setBlackList

public static void setBlackList(Message msg,
                                IDAddressPair[] blackList)
Set a black list to a Message. The message has to be one of REC_ROUTE_*.
